scripts.test:debug: cross-env DEBUG=Y HEADLESS=N npx wdio run config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tags='@demo' > output.txt
scripts.test:demo: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=N npx wdio run config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tags='@demo'
scripts.test:smoke: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=Y npx wdio run config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tags='@smoke'
scripts.uat:demo: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=N npx wdio run config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tags='@demo'
scripts.uat:smoke: cross-env DEBUG=N HEADLESS=Y npx wdio run config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tags='@smoke'
scripts.wdio-test: wdio run config/wdio.test.conf.ts && npm run report
